# Threshold boundary tests
# Testing entropy values near thresholds

# LOW ENTROPY - should NOT be redacted (below threshold)
# Hex with low entropy (2.0 bits < 3.0 threshold) - repeated pattern
low_hex=aaaabbbbccccddddaaaabbbbccccdddd

# Alphanumeric with low entropy (~3.5 bits < 4.5 threshold)
low_alnum=aaaaAAAAbbbbBBBBccccCCCCddddDDDD

# HIGH ENTROPY - should be redacted (above threshold)
# Hex near threshold (3.9 bits > 3.0 threshold)
high_hex=a1b2c3d4e5f6a7b8c9d0e1f2a3b4c5d6

# Alphanumeric near threshold (5.0 bits > 4.5 threshold)
high_alnum=xK9mNpL2qR5tW8vY1zA4bC7dE0fG3hJ6
